name: project-manager
description: Project Manager for easy access and switching between projects in Atom.

project-manager.description: Get access to all saved projects

prettifyTitle.description: Will suggest a prettified project title on save.

savePathsRelativeToHome.description: Will save paths relative to home path if possible.

sortBy.description: Default sorting is the order in which the projects are

includeGitRepositories.description: Will search for directories in your `Project Home` that include `.git` and list them.

ignoreDirectories.description: Comma separated list of directories to skip when looking for git repositories.

alwaysOpenInSameWindow.description: Will reverse `shift+enter` in the list view to open in a new window.
